name: Healthyfied Cabbage Shanghai
description: Indulge in a wholesome and nutritious twist with our Healthyfied Cabbage Shanghai recipe. Perfect for those seeking high-protein and high-fiber meals, this dish is a savory delight that's both low in carbs and beautifully healthified. Whether you're on a quest for healthy recipes or looking to maintain a balanced diet without compromising taste, this creation promises to cater to your needs while satisfying your cravings.
recipeIngredient: 1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse and finely shred the cabbage. Cut the eggplant and carrots into thin strips. Crumble the silken tofu.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the eggs in a large mixing bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the shredded cabbage, eggplant strips, crumbled tofu, shredded carrot, ground pork, salt, and ground black pepper to the bowl with the whisked eggs. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a skillet over medium heat. Take spoonfuls of the mixture and form them into small rolls. Cook in batches, turning occasionally, until golden brown and the pork is fully cooked, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
